doc:
Gloria Grey https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gloria_Grey 0 Gloria Grey (born Marie Draga, October 23, 1909—November 22, 1947) was an American screen and stage actress and director, appearing in mainly dramatic/romantic films during the silent era and after. Gloria_Grey ( born Marie_Draga , October_23_,_1909 — November_22_,_1947 ) was an_American_screen_and_stage_actress_and_director , appearing in mainly_dramatic/romantic_films during the_silent_era and after .
